channel.title: PvP Server home
channel.description:
Such servers as CammyPvP and PhatzPvP, are based in falador and camelot.
At the moment I am clueless where to setup home, I was suggested to make my own maps, but I am clueless in how to do so.
So where do you think is a suitable home for a pvp server.
inb4edge.

item.title: PvP Server home
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:13, topic:523652”][quote author=Mikeyzzz link=topic=642196.msg4324669#msg4324669 date=1372695464]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=642196.msg4324656#msg4324656 date=1372693656]

[quote author=Mikeyzzz link=topic=642196.msg4324632#msg4324632 date=1372689765]

how about in the dungeoneering maps… the guy who swings a full 360 around says CHAAAARGE. That room would be awesome for unique pking/home on the diameter of the brown region.
[/quote]going for 317 mapdata, its going to be Old School Pking.
[/quote]maze @ gnome village. Get to the outside part of it would be safe, anything else is no mans land.

Take it a step further have “mines” in the maze:D
[/quote]I’m just going to make my own maps

Good luck making a half decent custom map.[/quote]I have made the base of the map, floor and terrain wise, just need to learn how to add walls and what not also I don’t know how to add it to cache, so I’m just going to put it on stand-by for a bit, till I get a bit of time.

Read full topic
